post.author: 부기흡
post.content:
Welcome aboard.

Even if they are not finalized yet, you could start your work based on the currrent SRS and SDD. There would be minor changes later.

Install the components below to reproduce our development environment (not including Ruby).

1) Eclipse SDK 3.1.1
http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/

2) Exadel Studio 3.0
http://box.exadel.com/exadelproducts/app_products.process.main.start?_action=products

Struts tutorial:
http://www.exadel.com/exadelstudio/gs/ESStrutsGettingStarted.pdf

3) Hibernate Core 3.1
http://hibernate.org/6.html

Hibernate tutorial:
http://hibernate.org/5.html

4) MySQL (or your choice of DB, e.g. Apache Derby)
http://db.apache.org/derby/

Hibernate study meetings might be on every Friday night at 11:00 PM unless the shedule has changed. Check it out with Mr. Heo.
post.title: [re] Hi, has anyone woken up yet?
